reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of BIOL 201, MICB 201 or (b) BIOT 380.
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
description: Dynamics and control of prokaryotic cellular processes in response to the biotic and abiotic environment including metabolic interactions and metabolic cooperation between microorganisms.
